text: Yad anɨb okok mɨdupsek nɨŋɨd, gos nɨgtep gɨpin ak nɨm, aglɨl agɨnek, Yad Masedoniya plopens amnɨg, nɨbop ned nɨgɨnɨg am mɨdenɨm agɨnek. Nɨb ayɨp mɨdɨl, kelɨgɨl Masedoniya plopens amɨl kɨli ayɨp mɨdenɨm agɨnek. Pen adɨkɨd apɨl Judiya amnɨg, apɨl nɨbop tepayaŋ nɨgɨlɨg padɨkɨnɨm agɨnek. Anɨgen nɨm, yad ned ap nɨŋɨd amnɨnek kɨdek jɨtep ak ap nɨŋɨd amnɨneknɨŋ, nɨbi yɨp nɨgem tep gɨnɨmuŋ, mɨd dad amɨl, kɨdek yɨp pen dam kanɨb nab ak yokem Judiya amnɨm agɨnek.
